DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate pharmacokinetics and safety after oral administration of clopidogrel and aspirin in free combination as HCP0911.
DOC.brief_title: A Bioequivalence Study Comparing Clopidogrel/Aspirin Combination Tablet With Coadministration of Clopidogrel and Aspirin
DOC.criteria: Age between 20 and 55 Signed informed consent Has a history of hypersensitivity to IP ingredients Hypotension or hypertension Has a history of acute infection within 14days of screening
